Instance.description: A Major Event that uses Festival conditional layers and contains an Activity State with special sub-situation properties.

TunableTuple.name: activity_state
TunableTuple.description: The second state that this situation will be put into once the gather state ends.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableList.name: job_mapping
TunableList.description: A mapping between sub-situation job and the owner situation job. When creating the guest list for the sub-situation, job pairings will inform which Sim is pulled in to fill the sub-situation's job.

Tunable.name: Sub Situation Job
Tunable.description: A job created for the sub-situation.

Tunable.name: job
Tunable.description: A job from the owner situation. Sims with this job will be used as a source for the sub-situation's job.

TunableEnum.name: reuse_type
TunableEnum.description:
Rule to determine how the sub-situation job should be filled on next creation.
If Same, then on repeated iterations of the sub-situation, its job will be filled by the sim that had filled it in the past iterations.
If Different, then on repeated iterations of the sub-situation, its job will be filled by a sim other than those that filled it in past iterations.

Tunable.name: situation_iterations
Tunable.description: Number of iterations for which the sub-situation is created within the owning situation state.

Tunable.name: sub_situation
Tunable.description: Sub-situation to run within this situation state. When the sub-situation ends, the owning situation state will end.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: end_state
TunableTuple.description: The third state that this situation will be put into once the activity state ends.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.
